title: Requiem: Avenging Angel (GOG)
description:
Install instructions:
Note: There are two shortcuts provided to launch the game, one for 3dfx nglide (the default, and recommended shortcut), and one for Direct3D. For users that wish to use Direct3D, please note that there is a critical bug present in this version of the title.
- Run "setup_requiem_avenging_angel_2.0.0.8.exe"
- Play
Credits: this release was made possible by Swapware Games Network!
If you like this game, support the developers and BUY IT!
PLEASE REMEMBER TO SEED, MANY OTHERS WANT THIS! :)

Title: REQUIEM: AVENGING ANGEL
Genre: Shooter - FPP - Sci-fi
Works on: Windows (Vista, 7, 8, 10)
Languages: Audio and text: English
Features: single-player - multi-player
Released: March 31, 1999
Size: 393.5 MB
Company: Cyclone Studios / Retroism
Rating:	ESRB Rating: Mature (with Animated Blood and Gore, Animated Violence, Strong Language)
Store page: https://www.gog.com/game/requiem_avenging_angel

About:
Requiem: Avenging Angel is a 3D, first-person action game of biblical proportions set in a world under siege. A holy war rages on Earth between Heaven's Chosen Soldiers and Hell's Fallen Angels. You are Malachi, a Chosen Angel, sent to Earth to save Creation from the wrath of the Fallen. Blast your way through an immersive futuristic 3D world developing Angelic powers like possession, blood boil, locust swarms, and the ability to turn your enemies to pillars of salt. Without you, mankind doesn't have a prayer.
All the heart-pounding action of a top shooter, with a rich story line and realistic character interaction
Fight demons and hell's minions using rare angelic powers, including: Bloodboil, Lightning, Flight, Holy Light, and Turn to Salt
Take up arms against the dark horde of the Fallen and utilize 7 unique weapons of the plane of Creation, including: the â€œTrinityâ€ Combat Shotgun, â€œBeelzebombâ€ Grenade Launcher and â€œRevelationsâ€ Railgun

Minimum system requirements - Windows: Vista / 7 / 8 / 10
Processor: 1.8 GHz Processor
Memory: 512MB RAM (1 GB recommended)
Graphics: 3D graphics card compatible with DirectX 7 (compatible with DirectX 9 recommended)
Hard Drive: 2GB HDD
Mouse, Keyboard
